syllabus:
"Studies in Motion Graphics" explores the arts and knowledge of motion graphics. It features hands-on experiences of production for art and design, with techniques involved with motion graphics. The course comprises 3 parts:  
The 1st part explores tools and techniques in relation to motion graphics.  
The 2nd part explores wider concepts, workflows, and techniques that work around with motion graphics, especially the application to new media.  
The 3rd part focuses on creative content by completing a project-oriented production for each student or group with those techniques acquainted from the previous.
